name: DRKM Strategies
tagline: There is more to a website than just a pretty face
description:
DRKM is a one stop shop for today’s marketing needs. We started our business modeled around the customer needs because we have spent our career as the customer.
Our promise is that if you don’t like our results then we won’t either and we will keep working to do our best to find results we both can like.  Why? Because we are on your side.
We are about Developing Relationships, Knowledge and Marketing Strategies over the long-haul.
